"Neusen Plant":
"Neusen Plant is a special Combat Section in the Stia Region.

If you defeat a boss enemy that appears from a PSE Climax, the enemies and objects that appear in the Section will change."

"Defeating PSE Climax bosses will apply a special effect to you, strengthening the power of a specific kind of action for a set time.

Each effect stacks up to 3 times, and only applies while you remain within Neusen Plant."
